DOC.brief_summary: This study compare subject response symptom result administration three clinical assessment . * The 3 assessment 1. passive upright tilt table testing , 2. quantitative sudomotor axon reflex testing ( QSART ) 3. punch biopsy . The comparison result two subject group : - Group A , migraine suffer patient without aura - Group B , migraine suffer patient without aura diagnose orthostatic intolerance ( i.e. , feel dizzy faint make body position change ) .
